item.title: Chapter VI: Bonfire
item.description: I went to a bonfire! I met lots of new friends! They were having a great time and I had lots of fun watching them.

item.title: Chapter V-a: Chicago Visit
item.description: I got a chance to go back and play with Winnie while my family met some of The Walking Dead cast.

item.title: Chapter V: Exploring backyard
item.description: Exploring my new backyard with funny white stuff!

item.title: Chapter IV: New Home
item.description: I love my new home and I met another family member, my new sister!

item.title: Chapter III: Winnie
item.description: My cousin, Winnie! Winnie lives in the Chicago suburbs not far from where I was born.

item.title: Chapter II: Adopted
item.description: I met some of my new family. My dad and brother! They were so happy to meet me too.

item.title: Chapter I: The Beignning
item.description: I was born January 10, 2018 in the suburbs of Chicago. I don’t remember much more! lol
